metadata.title: CVE-2024-36946 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: phonet:fix rtm_phonet_notify() skb allocation fill_route() stores three componentsin the skb: - struct rtmsg - RTA_DST (u8) - RTA_OIF (u32) Therefore,rtm_phonet_notify() should use NLMSG_ALIGN(sizeof(struct rtmsg)) +nla_total_size(1) + nla_total_size(4)

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
